title: Rounded slab serif
content:
The basic structure resembles Rockwell to a certain degree, and Memphis Soft Rounded comes reasonably close apart from the obviously different ‘R’, but I was wondering if anyone could match this geometric slab serif with blunt serifs.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eastern_boys_type_5748.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: So they closed the letter forms? Cannot find a non-stencil version.

Just download the font. There is the non-stencil version in it. You’ll see it also at the bottom of the page.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pironrevisioned_5333.png)
